rukus.text: Ih, Oebbi Iumeo ed leeqq, akked lewqama, talalt i llzem. Igdel tucmitin, ayen n dir, ddeok. A kwen Ipnabi, amar a d temmektim
Eiifet di lemaahda n Oebbi ma taahdem. Ur eentet di tgallit ma tetebbtem, u tcubkem Oebbi. Ih, Oebbi Ieoa acu txeddmem

Ur cebbut tin ifsin lxiv is, mbaad ma tcudd it, s loehd. Tepparam tagallit nnwen i umkellex garawen: ad ikk lois sennig wayev. Oebbi Ipjeooib ikwen kan, yis. War ccekk, ad awen Ibeggen, ass n tnekra, ayen i$ef temgarradem
Lemmer i S ihwi, i Oebbi, a kwen Irr d yiwen n lois. Maca, Itellif win i S ihwan, Inehhu win i S ihwan. S tidep, a ppepusteqsim $ef wayen txeddmem
Ur pparat tagallit nnwen i umkellex garawen. Ad iccev uvao mbaad ma iiief. A pjeobem tawa$it, ilmend n wayen tveoofem seg ubrid n Oebbi. I kunwi, aaaqeb abarar
Ur ppa$et s lemaahda n Oebbi ayen oxisen. Ih, yif it i kunwi wayen illan $eo Oebbi, lemmer teeoim
Ayen illan $uowen, ad ifukk; ayen illan $eo Oebbi, ad idum. War ccekk, a Nkafi wid iueboen, s wazal n wayen xeddmen ifuqen
Wid ixeddmen ayen ilhan, d ddkeo ne$ d nnta, u umnen, a ten Nessider di tmeddurt tumaint, a ten Nkafi s wazal n wayen xeddmen ifuqen
Mara te$oev Leqwoan, ssuter a k Iaateq Oebbi, si Cciian imenfi
Neppa, s tidep, ur isai adabu $ef wid iumnen, i ippeklen $ef Mass nnsen
Adabu ines, $ef wid kan i t irran d bab, d wid i S ipcaraken
